name: There's a ghost in my apartment ( and my tv won't work )
name_original: There's a ghost in my apartment ( and my tv won't work )
description:
This is John.

John doesn't have much luck in his life, he lives alone in a small apartment and recently, something strange is going on...

Help John and his new guest in this mini-puzzle game!

Dungeon Acolytes is a small indie studio recently created. We are doing some free games to learn and improve our style! 

After exploring dungeons with Navarun!, we decided to create a little project to train ourselves and create some tools to improve our workflow. 

There is a Ghost in my Apartment (and the tv doesn't work) is made with Godot in just over a month. 

Control : 

Q / D : Move

E : Interact

Tab : Change inventory slot

Echap : Cancel

Team :

Programming and Art: Siieg

Sound design and Music: Robin FREVILLE / Frerobin

Communication: Pebble

Follow us on our social networks!

Insta / Tiktok / Twitter
